description: The information provided above is a formal contract notice from the Canadian government. This is an official solicitation for contractual services from qualified suppliers. The contract is for the services of Three (3) Senior Web Designers under Stream 1, Application Services, Category A13. The intent of this solicitation is to establish one (1) Contract for three (3) initial years, with the option to extend the term of the Contract by up to two (2) one-year irrevocable option periods under the same conditions.

full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Project Title:** Three (3) Senior Web Designers for Department of National Defence

## Overview

The Government of Canada, through the Department of National Defence, invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the provision of three (3) senior web designers under the TBIPS (Task-Based Informatics Professional Services) supply arrangement.

## Tender Details

* **Tender Number:** W8486-249610/A
* **Publication Date:** 2024-05-15
* **Closing Date:** 2024-06-18 14:00:00

## Deliverables

The requirement is for three (3) senior web designers to work on a project from 12 October 2024 to 11 October 2027, with an option to extend the term by up to two years.

## Technical Requirements

A team of three senior web designers is required to:

* Design and develop web applications for the Department of National Defence
* Collaborate with stakeholders to ensure project objectives are met
* Participate in code reviews and ensure adherence to coding standards

## Qualifications

To be eligible to submit a proposal, suppliers must be pre-qualified under the TBIPS supply arrangement and meet the following qualifications:

* Security clearance: Secret
* Work within the National Capital Region

## Procurement Method

This is a competitive tendering process. The closing date for submissions is 2024-06-18 14:00:00.

## Contact Information

For inquiries regarding this Request for Proposal, please contact Kayla Shabsove at kayla.shabsove@forces.gc.ca or (343) 596-9352.

## Important Notes

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement.
* This tender is only open to the pre-qualified suppliers listed below.

```
// List of pre-qualified suppliers is very long, please refer to original text for the full list
```
